file_content.text: I look forward to seeing your progress. Or death.
Your trainers await.
Acolyte. I come with a message.
Lord Baras can teach you the secrets of the Sith but not all of the skills.
For that, there are specialists in the Academy. Lord Baras commands you to find them and improve your skills.
Overseer Tremel can teach you the ways of the Sith but not all of the skills.
For that, there are specialists in the Academy. Overseer Tremel wishes you to meet them and learn what you can.
Makes sense to me.
An acolyte who thinks. Good. There is hope for you and pleasure awaiting your instructors.
It is good to see such a young beauty of the true blood raised so high.
[Flirt] You're beautiful.
Something for you to aspire to. Your skin marks you as a worthy partner but no Sith will dally below her rank.
Keep that in your mind when the training grows difficult.
The pure blood in your veins gives you a very attractive coloring.
[Flirt] Pretty red skin.
To even touch a pureblood woman, you must prove that the Sith runs strong through your muddied veins. A Sith woman only respects power.
Go. Someday you may learn enough to impress me--if not kill me.
You are pureblood Sith. Like me.
We've the same skin tone.
Not like you. Like what you could be someday.
You need to hone your skills with the best Korriban has to offer.
Your red skin is lovely.
Beautiful skin you have.
It marks me as your better. For now and all time.
Does that anger you? Then go learn how to kill me.
Sure, I'm in no rush.
Make the time. This is not optional.
You will find the best trainers in the Academy's archive. You are expected there shortly.
I can be no help to you.
